thread.title: Major search for missing kayaker of Aberdeenshire coast
thread.title_full: Major search for missing kayaker of Aberdeenshire coast

title: Major search for missing kayaker of Aberdeenshire coast
text:
Major search for missing kayaker of Aberdeenshire coast 6 February 2017 Close share panel Image copyright JASPERIMAGE A major air, land and sea search is under way for a kayaker missing off the Aberdeenshire coast. 
The 35-year-old man was reported overdue yesterday evening after going on a weekend trip from Portsoy harbour. 
His flatmate raised the alarm at about 22:00 on Sunday when he failed to his return to his home in Laurencekirk. 
Four lifeboat crews, a coastguard helicopter, police and coastguard search teams have been taking part in the operation. 
Lifeboats from Banff, Portsoy, Buckie and Macduff were involved along with 12 coastguard personnel and five police units who were conducting a ground search.
